parameters.name: DataQualityScanId
parameters.description: The ID of the data quality monitor that the alert rule targets.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the results.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of records to return on each page.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description:
The list of sorting fields. Supports fields such as last modified time and creation time. Format: "SortField+SortOrder (Desc/Asc)", where Asc is the default. Valid values:

*   CreateTime (Desc/Asc)
*   Id (Desc/Asc)
